name: @azure/core-amqp
description: Common library for amqp based azure sdks like @azure/event-hubs.
author: Microsoft Corporation

scripts.build: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run extract-api
scripts.build:test: echo skipped. actual commands inlined in browser test scripts
scripts.bundle: dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run bundle --polyfill-node false --inject-node-polyfills true --ignore-missing-node-builtins true
scripts.clean: dev-tool run vendored rimraf --glob dist dist-* temp types coverage coverage-browser .nyc_output *.tgz *.log test*.xml
scripts.extract-api: dev-tool run build-package && dev-tool run extract-api
scripts.integration-test: npm run integration-test:node && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.lint: eslint README.md package.json api-extractor.json src test
scripts.lint:fix: eslint README.md package.json api-extractor.json src test --fix --fix-type [problem,suggestion]
scripts.test: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && npm run unit-test:node && npm run bundle && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test
scripts.test:browser: npm run clean && npm run unit-test:browser && npm run integration-test:browser
scripts.test:node: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package && npm run unit-test:node && npm run integration-test:node
scripts.unit-test: npm run unit-test:node && npm run unit-test:browser
scripts.unit-test:browser: npm run clean && dev-tool run build-package &&  dev-tool run build-test && dev-tool run test:vitest --no-test-proxy --browser
